resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below

A. Foodiction is a website and app built to save you time and money when ordering food. Foodiction provide online ordering systems to restaurants and delivery services. As a portal, it allows you find nearby restaurants that are using our software, view their entire menu and select exactly what you want. Place your order and pay online or pay when you pick up. Pick up or have your food delivered from restaurants that offer delivery without waiting in lines or call waiting. You can even compare 3rd party delivery services that may be available.
Q. Do I need to pay extra to order using this site/app?

A. Not as long as the restaurant you order from is not charging any convenience fees you don\'t have to pay extra. Restaurants can choose to charge convenience. Our goal is to provide best online ordering and deliver system to restaurants and delivery services which offer the best possible experience for customers
